text.title: Interactive_CGG_Friendly
text.more:
The character network for the CGG.
The most prominent factions are Irish (green) and Vikings (blue).
Nodes that are unattached to any of the two factions are in grey. 
Edges between Irish are in green, edges between Vikings in blue.
Intermingling edges between Irish and Vikings are represented in red and any edges involving unspecified nodes are shown in grey.
